Антон Невежин

Фронтенд-разработчик с большим стажем

Портфолио

Choosing The Right Path
Requiring the individual to remember what not to think of infers that they have already thought it. Although this is well intentioned and the goal certainly is to reduce the quantity of these bothersome thoughts
